TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DeviceSpecificControlBuilder extends System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

Docs.summary: Provides parsing support for DeviceSpecific/Choice constructs. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificControlBuilder> class is internally created and used by the page parser when parsing a [\<DeviceSpecific>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/6dca8eb9-d6f6-479a-abac-20fc9d485cc8) element.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificControlBuilder> class implements the following persistence behaviors: It ignores white space directly inside the control, and it allows only a [\<Choice>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) element as child.

Docs.permission: for operating in a hosted environment. Demand value: ; Permission value: .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is called by the ASP.NET page framework during parsing and is not intended to be called directly in your code.
